name: Exaeon
description:
[Summery]

A 2d Metroidvania game designed for Metroidvania Month 13.  We worked as hard as we could on this between us going to work.  If you have any feedback/comments feel free to post!  Thanks for checking our game out! 

[Info]

You collect monster parts and use Bioessence to make abilities on your ships crafting bench.

All monster parts are a 1/16 drop chance. (for now)

[Controls] 

[Left Click] - Shoot

[Right Click] - Aim Gun

[A] - Move Left

[D] - Move Right

[Space] - Jump

[E] - Interact

[M] - Map

[Tab] - Status Page

[Credits]

[Dragonxsx] - Music/Sound/Art Work

[Goonius] - Programming/Art Work
